Firebase Database Vulnerability

1. If rules are not secure (read & write = true i.e. anyone can read and write data)
Read data api hit: https://firebase-databse-project-id.firebaseio.com/.json  (Replace project id with yours)

2. If rules are secure but any authorized or register user can read data (read & write = auth != null)
Read data api hit: https://(your_project_id).firebaseio.com/.json?auth=(your_login_token)&print=pretty
